item.title: Proto-Danksharding: Speeding Up Blobs Verification
item.description: Introduction The Ethereum Foundation proposed EIP-4844 on February 25, 2022, with the objective of reducing gas fees. It introduces a new transaction type called “blob”, which is temporarily stored and committed using the KZG commitment scheme. In addition, the Ethereum Foundation developed a project called c-kzg-4844, which provides a minimal implementation of the polynomial commitments API written in C. This project does not use parallelization and exposes its C API for bindings in different programming languages.
